49class DummyReader : public Reader {
50 Location loc_{};
51 std::uint32_t total_{0};
52public:
53 OpenResult open(const std::string& filePath) override {
54 (void)filePath;
55 total_ = 100; // placeholder
56 loc_.page = 1;
57 return {true, "opened (dummy)", total_};
58 }
59 bool goTo(const Location& loc) override {
60 if (loc.page == 0 || loc.page > total_) return false;
61 loc_ = loc; return true;
62 }
63 Location current() const override { return loc_; }
64};
